description: Simple test to verify context injection works

cells.name: phase_b
cells.instructions: Say exactly: 'Hello from Phase B! The secret code is BETA-456.' Then route to phase_c_selective.

cells.name: phase_c_selective
cells.instructions:
You are Phase C with SELECTIVE context. You should ONLY see Phase A's output.

What secret code do you see? If you see BETA-456, something is wrong.

Respond with: 'I only see code: [the code you see]'
